title: Executive Order 11385-Placing an Additional Position in Level IV of the Federal Executive Salary Schedule
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 5317 of title 5 of the United States Code, as amended, and as President of the United States, section 1 of Executive Order No. 11248 of October 10, 1965, as amended, is further amended by adding thereto the following:
[NAME], Deputy Administrator, Federal Highway Administration, Department of Transportation.
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11385-Placing an Additional Position in Level IV of the Federal Executive Salary Schedule Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/239371
